Title: Object: Bergh Sinai alias Oreb
Series: Views from Arabia, Judea, Chaldea, Syria, Jerusalem, Antiochia, Aleppo, Mecca etc.
Description: View of Mount Sinai in Egypt; landscape with a procession of figures on a road in central foreground, some on horseback and some riding camels, a large mountain beyond; letters A-D within composition indicating locations; after Jan Peeters. 1672 Etching
Curator's comments: This is one from a series of fourteen plates showing views from the Middle East after drawings by Jan Peeters, published by Jacob Peeters. For the full set see 2AA*,a.43.108. 2AA*,a.43.108-2AA*,a.43.121. For a comment on the entire set see 2AA*,a.43.108.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (23) (Gaspar Bouttats)
Landwehr 1970 / Romeyn de Hooghe as book illustrator (82)
